We transferred your personal account ${email} into a team account, including all
your conversations and history. You are now the owner of the team (${team_name}
).

Invite other people to join your team and adjust settings in your team
management dashboard.

OPEN TEAM MANAGEMENT [${url}]If you can’t select the button, copy and paste this
link to your browser:

${url}

Nếu bạn có bất kỳ thắc mắc nào, xin vui lòng liên hệ với chúng tôi [${support}].

ID Nhóm: ${team_id}
